summary: Siimply a unique Skeever follower named Durny, made in memory of my rat who passed.
descriptionHtml:
[heading][color=red][b]Durny the Skeever Follower[/color][/b][/heading]

Durny is a unique skeeever follower found in the Alchemist's Shack in the Rift. He is essential, doesn't affect your sneak meter and will even carry your stuff for you! He even levels with you and doesn't mind if you tell him to wait behind. He is suitable for beginner characters, right up to Level 30.

I made this mod for my own use, but figured I would share it anyway. It is also quite personal to me, since the skeever is named after my baby rat, Durnehviir, who recently passed. Here's a photo of him:

[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2iks8t5.jpg[/IMG]

So, yeah. Use if you like.

[color=darkorange]===[b]Installation:[/b]====[/color]

Just drop the file into your data folder. Or use the NMM.
To uninstall, just remove the file.

[color=darkorange]=====[b]Permissions and Credits[/b]=====[/color]

This mod is not to be uploaded anywhere but the Skyrim Nexus. Please report to me if you see this anywhere else. I will allow editing, if notified.
Thanks to Bethesda for creating a great game and letting us fiddle with it.

[color=red]Thanks for reading and check my page for more mods![/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7065334/?tb=mods&pUp=1 ] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2dryws3.png[/IMG][/url]
author: TaeRai
